queries.sql: SELECT `particulars`.*, `categories`.`id` as `c_id`, `categories`.`category_name`, `categories`.`category_slug`, `categories`.`part`, `subcategories`.`id` as `s_id`, `subcategories`.`subcategory_name`, `subcategories`.`subcategory_status`, `subcategories`.`subcategory_slug`, `subcategories`.`created_at` as `screated`, `subcategories`.`updated_at` as `supdated`, `statements`.`name` as `statement`, `account_types`.`id` as `type_id`, `account_types`.`name` as `account_type`, `cash_flow_types`.`id` as `cash_flow_id`, `cash_flow_types`.`name` as `cash_flow_type` FROM `particulars` LEFT JOIN `categories` ON `categories`.`id` = `particulars`.`category_id` LEFT JOIN `subcategories` ON `subcategories`.`id` = `particulars`.`subcategory_id` LEFT JOIN `statements` ON `statements`.`id` = `categories`.`statement_id` LEFT JOIN `account_types` ON `account_types`.`id` = `particulars`.`account_typeId` LEFT JOIN `cash_flow_types` ON `cash_flow_types`.`id` = `particulars`.`cash_flow_typeId` WHERE `particulars`.`deleted_at` IS NULL AND `particulars`.`id` = '1'

queries.sql: SELECT particular_id, SUM(directDebit) as directDebit, SUM(directCredit) as directCredit, SUM(reverseDebit) as reverseDebit, SUM(reverseCredit) as reverseCredit FROM ( SELECT `particular_id` as `particular_id`, SUM(CASE WHEN entries.status = "debit" THEN entries.amount ELSE 0 END) as directDebit, SUM(CASE WHEN entries.status = "credit" THEN entries.amount ELSE 0 END) as directCredit, 0 as `reverseDebit`, 0 as `reverseCredit` FROM `entries` WHERE `entries`.`particular_id` IN ('1','2','5','6','7','8','10','11','12','13','16','20','26','3','4','23') GROUP BY `entries`.`particular_id` UNION ALL SELECT `payment_id` as `particular_id`, 0 as `directDebit`, 0 as `directCredit`, SUM(CASE WHEN entries.status = "credit" THEN entries.amount ELSE 0 END) as reverseDebit, SUM(CASE WHEN entries.status = "debit" THEN entries.amount ELSE 0 END) as reverseCredit FROM `entries` WHERE `entries`.`payment_id` IN ('1','2','5','6','7','8','10','11','12','13','16','20','26','3','4','23') GROUP BY `entries`.`payment_id` ) as combined GROUP BY particular_id
